php.java.bridge
Interface ILogger

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChainsawLogger, Logger, SimpleLog4jLogger, Util.Logger
public interface ILogger

The log interface for the PHP/Java Bridge log.

Author:
jostb
See Also:
FileLogger, ChainsawLogger, SimpleLog4jLogger
